title: SBF Trial – Week 5 kicks off with SBF retaking the stand for an intense cross-examination
description:
The fifth week of the high-stakes trial that has captivated the cryptocurrency world began with Sam Bankman-Fried (SBF) resuming his testimony on the stand before a thorough cross-examination by the prosecution. SBF was hit with intense questioning about his role as the CEO of FTX and the inner workings of the crypto exchange in both […]

The post SBF Trial – Week 5 kicks off with SBF retaking the stand for an intense cross-examination appeared first on CryptoSlate.
